message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is simply too low for me.  How about we split the difference?  I'll accept $10,500. Let's make this deal happen!
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. I would like to propose $10,200 as a counteroffer. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
